-- | Scotty server backend for yaml-rpc
--   
--   This package provides Scotty-based server backend for yaml-rpc
--   package.
@package yaml-rpc-scotty
@version 1.0.2

module Network.YAML.Scotty

-- | Scotty handler. Serves each method on <tt>/:method</tt>.
servePost :: Dispatcher IO -> ScottyM ()

-- | Scotty handler. Serves each method on <tt>/:method</tt>.
servePostT :: (ScottyError e, MonadIO m) => Dispatcher m -> ScottyT e m ()
